Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web

Class CompressLoadBalancer

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web.BaseWebLoadBalancer
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web.CompressLoadBalancer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILoadBalancer
public class CompressLoadBalancer extends BaseWebLoadBalancer implements ILoadBalancer
A load balancer, which compresses the load into the smallest number of VMs whose utilisation is below certain thresholds.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

      cpuThreshold - - the CPU threshold. Must be in the interval [0, 1].
